example.parse: (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 托比亚斯・弗雷德里克松)) (VP (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP-PN (NR 米兰))) (ADVP (AD 曾)) (VP (VV 闯进) (NP-OBJ (NN 半决赛)))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 但)) (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 争夺) (NP-OBJ (NN 决赛权)))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 比赛))) (LC 中))) (VP (VV 负于) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 后来)) (VP (VV 夺得) (NP-OBJ (NN 冠军))))) (DEC 的))) (NP-APP (NN 哥哥)) (NP-PN (NR 马蒂亚斯・弗雷德里克松)))))) (PU 。))
